title: Abdoulie Sanyang
text:
Abdoulie Sanyang (born May 8, 1999) is a <a href="The%20Gambia">Gambian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="K%20Beerschot%20VA">Beerschot</a> in the <a href="Belgian%20First%20Division%20A">Belgian First Division A</a>, on loan from Superstars Academy.
Sanyang joined Lommel in the <a href="List%20of%20Belgian%20football%20transfers%20summer%202019">summer 2019 transfer window</a>, arriving on a loan basis from Superstars Academy in Gambia together with his fellow countrymen <a href="Alieu%20Jallow">Alieu Jallow</a> and <a href="Salif%20Kujabi">Salif Kujabi</a>. Sanyang was awarded several starts over the coming months and even managed to score the equalising goal in the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Belgian%20Cup">2019–20 Belgian Cup</a> match against <a href="Standard%20Li%C3%A8ge">Standard Liège</a>, his team eventually going down 2–1 due to a last minute winner by the home team.
